author: Connie Moser
title: Chrome River Selected by Amadeus
text:
Chrome River, a leading provider of expense management and supplier invoice processing software, Amadeus North America selected Chrome River EXPENSE as its expense reporting system for its over 1,000 employees in North America. Amadeus North America, which is a leading supplier of IT solutions that enable success in the travel and tourism industry, spent several months searching for expense reporting software to replace its manual process. Amadeus’ goal was to select a company that met its international business process needs along with a company that was agile and could provide support as its needs grow and change.
Requirements of the system included
Mobile functionality to make expense reporting easier for travelers Multi-language and multi-currency support for a wide array of international expenses Improved on-demand financial reporting and analytics for management Integrated pre-trip details and expense data with its AeTM online booking tool Highly configurable application at the customer level to meet sophisticated travel policies A system that easily integrates with its global ERP financial system
“We are excited that Amadeus North America selected Chrome River EXPENSE to automate its manual expense reporting process. We pride ourselves in being flexible and responsive to the changing needs of organizations, and look forward to providing the solution and partnership that Amadeus needs as it continues its fast-paced growth,” said Alan Rich, CEO of Chrome River.
